subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Novak Djokovic joined top-ranked Rafael Nadal in the semifinals of the ATP World Tour Finals in London by defeating Juan Martín del Potro, 6-3, 3-6, 6-3, on Thursday.
snippet: The defending champion Novak Djokovic joined top-ranked Rafael Nadal in the semifinals of the ATP World Tour Finals in London by defeating Juan Martín del Potro, 6-3, 3-6, 6-3, on Thursday.
